# clbart

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of clbart is to estimate heterogeneous exposure effects of a primary exposure in a case-crossover design.

## Installation

You can install the development version of clbart from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jacobenglert/clbart")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(clbart)
# Coming soon
```
